website_summaries.verdict: A good value of 10 disposable rain ponchos that don't last long but work in a pinch.
pros: A good fit for larger people
Easy to unfold and put on
Can be taken off and put back on without ripping
Inexpensive enough to dispose after use
Comes folded small for easy transport
cons: The 50-inch x 40-inch size on this poncho is too bulky for petite people

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Ponchos -- Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using these at on a Disneyland trip. Much handier, I'm sure, than buying expensive ones there and trying to dry them out and get them folded up for the suitcase. These we'll toss at the park after seeing the World of Color and going on Grizzly River Run.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Red

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and great pricing.
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the ones I have gotten from some of the big box stores. They hold up well and are so much less expensive than buying a poncho at a sporting event or amusement park. They easily fit in a back pocket so each family member can carry their own and be ready if the Florida skies drop an unexpected afternoon shower.
customer_reviews.author: jsf

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 in 10 pack box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 10 pack of clear ponchos. There were only 8 in the box. I would like my other 2 sent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on primeday
customer_reviews.text: Idk about sturdiness yet. We haven't used them. But they were a good deal on amazon prime day last year.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a husky guy with a backpack. ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for a husky guy with a backpack. Nothing fancy. Small and light enough to tuck one away anywhere you might experience an unexpected need for rain cover.
customer_reviews.author: NY2NC Transplant

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE CHEAP PLASTIC WRAP
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Seriously. I bought these for our upcoming Disneyland trip which is forecasted to rain all day. These are crap. Plastic wrap at best. Do not buy. It’s too late to order different ponchos so I’m hoping that one of our local stores have something better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Vanderspek

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than most
customer_reviews.text: Have used several of the ponchos now and like them. They are easy to put on and are sturdy enough to be taken off and put back on. The 'sleeves' are a little short but, I just put my arms inside. I would/will buy again as I keep giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: rlt

customer_reviews.title: Pass by this item
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and flimsy ... I had to use 2 in one day because they ripped. It was a waste on time and money
customer_reviews.author: hollewood

customer_reviews.title: These worked great. We had an outside event and the forecast ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. We had an outside event and the forecast was showing rain that was unexpected. They arrived in 2 days and were definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep a few on hand
customer_reviews.text: These are just right for keeping a couple in the glove box, a couple more in the garage, and one in the kids' backpacks for those random unexpected moments of need. Decent quality for one-time 'when-needed' use and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Moderately good product. I bought these to have in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Moderately good product. I bought these to have in my car not necessarily for me but in case there is some one in need of protection from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: bbtosew

customer_reviews.title: Keep four of them in each vehicle for the family ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep four of them in each vehicle for the family. Don't take up much space and come in handy at ballgames, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McBride

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t recommend these more
customer_reviews.text: I ran the 2018 Boston Marathon (torrential downpours all day) and wore this over a rain jacket. My upper body was completely dry after being in the rain all day and I used the same poncho that entire time. It actually kept the heat in, which was huge in the near-hypothermic weather conditions. I couldn’t recommend these more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Raincoats for a cruise
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat was a little thinner than I was hoping. I'll see how well it works next week.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: These are great and fit big people
customer_reviews.text: These are great and fit big people. We carry them in the car, and i have re-ordered them 3 times. Great for travel tournaments when the weather can change.
customer_reviews.author: SLSG Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our family had a college graduation and it was rainy and cold. These rain ponchos were a life saver. Would definitely recommend them. I put a couple in my car also in case of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Great for amusement parks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Disney trip. Much cheaper than buying theirs, and you can just trash them when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Small package and easy to keep in the car. We were the envy of everyone around us when it rained at a soccer game. They lasted and did not rip like others we have used.
customer_reviews.author: SuperBusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We used the same ones on a Disney World vacation for 5 straight days and never had to open a new pack. We just hung them up to dry every night. The only thing that didn't work so well was the hood--the wind blows it right off.
customer_reviews.author: sharinpro

customer_reviews.title: In Case Of Rain
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and arrived quickly. Packaged great. Product looks to be just as advertised. Are lightweight and small enough to fit individually in a pocket. Plan to take on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Running in woods with young kids and they held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Much thicker and more durable than expected. Running in woods with young kids and they held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome timing and size. Gave one out to the Disneyland trip. Perfect size for their packs.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Very compact and easy to keep in pocket. Provided good protection from the rain and was roomy so you did not feel like you were wearing a sandwich bag.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: After the marching band got caught in the rain , we bought these and they worked great...
customer_reviews.author: MJQ

customer_reviews.title: i bought these because we were hosting a NYC Marathon ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought these because we were hosting a NYC Marathon party and it was supposed to rain! They were a hit while we cheered on the mobs, we stayed dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rain/wind proof ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Nice rain/wind proof ponchos. I am members of my family wore them when visiting Machu Pichu in Peru. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Lydon

customer_reviews.title: These worked great. Nice and long
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a camping trip and it did end up pouring for a day an a half. These worked great. Nice and long, easy to the at the bottom so my kids wouldn't trip while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bold Colors, came boxed in a reusable box too. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: emb16458

customer_reviews.title: Great for car
customer_reviews.text: These are great to store in my car for emergency use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazone Customare

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. Disposable rain ponchos that are ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Disposable rain ponchos that are compact and lightweight for my daughter who does parades often.
customer_reviews.author: kbear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked very well for vacation and could be reused!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Ray

customer_reviews.title: all my family members like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Really very cmofortable, all my family members like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The material is so thin it breaks just by putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell E Livengood

customer_reviews.title: 2 Missing from Package
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality ponchos, however, I only received 8 in the package when I was supposed to receive 10!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scheel

customer_reviews.title: keep good shape and can be used next time
customer_reviews.text: The product is prefect, durable, and convenient. we use it for our two week's trip in CA. keep good shape and can be used next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, and packed nicely. I will definately order again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: good product, used for camping
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, good product, used for camping. Cover me and my pack in hiking, release the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value, pretty handy!
customer_reviews.text: received them, all transparent, which is fine by me, size is large enough for a big dude like me and my much tinyer wfe also wears it well, can't wait to try them in our upcoming travel, instead of carrying a cumbersome umbrella, these emergency ponchos should keep us from carryinmg it, leave our hands to use onmly with our camera, etc.
customer_reviews.author: chesu

customer_reviews.title: Great Ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in its own box in 4 thin, individual packages good to take camping or just to leave in the car in case a storm hits. The hood is adjustable, large enough to fit anyone, and has openings on the sides so you can still reach your pockets. Sturdy for a disposable poncho, can definitely hold up in a storm or be reused. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not recomended
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is really cheap. I keep them in my cooler when we go to Disney as a back up when it starts to rain. They are really hard to unfold out and they are epic huge for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews before I purchased but was not the quality I expected
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Which is great! That's what I bought them for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and they are mostly single or two time use before they start tearing in places. Which is great! That's what I bought them for. Cheap and easy to keep in the car when you need some emergency rain cover. Also the 10 pack is awesome for when you have friends that need rain cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: AntTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item brought to Disney! It was hot and wet - this was a great help!
customer_reviews.author: PROSE

product_meta.title: Zoophyter “Rain-Proof King” 10pcs Adult Emergency Disposable Rain Poncho
feature_bullets: [EASY TO CARRY & LIGHT WEIGHT (1.5 oz) ] Different from the most poncho on amazon, zoophyter “rain-proof king” poncho are small when fold but big when unfold. Perfect for disney day trips, vacation, travel, day hikes, emergencies.

[MORE DURABLE] Made with High Quality Waterproof and Tear Resistant Polyethylene material. Disposable price but performed as a decent raincoat. They were much thicker than the typical rain poncho and can be reused.
[LOW COST HIGH QUALITY] We really pride ourselves in offering high quality equipment at a low cost.
[WIND & RAIN PROOF] The difference between them is that "Wind-Proof King" are thicker and “Rain-Proof King” are smaller when folded.
[MONEY-BACK WARRANTY] We believe in our products, that's why we back them all with a Money-Back Warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.
